#include <stdio.h>
int a[100001];
int main ()
{
    int n,q,p,i,x,y,u,t,l,m;
    scanf ("%d%d", &n, &q);
    scanf ("%d", &u);
    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        a[i] = -1;
    }
    
    for (i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
        scanf ("%d%d", &x, &y);
        a[y] = x;
       // printf ("input\n");
    }
    
    for (i = 0; i < q; i++) {
        p = 0;
        scanf ("%d%d", &x, &y);
        l = x;
        m = y;
       // u = 0;
        while (a[y] != x && a[y] != -1) {
              // printf ("1  %d", a[y]);
              y = a[y];
             // u++;
             // if (u == 4)
             // break;
             
        }
        
        if (a[y] == x) {
                 p = -1;
        }
        x = l;
        y = m;
        t = x;
        x = y;
        y = t;
        
        while (a[y] != x && a[y] != -1) {
        //      printf ("2");
              y = a[y];
        }
        
        if (a[y] == x) {
               //  printf ("%d  %d", x, a[y]);
                 p = 1;
        }
        
        printf ("%d\n", p);
    }
    
    //getch ();
    return 0;
}
